hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo su - root<<EOF #gpgkey=http://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3/OS/aarch64/RPM-GPG-KEY-openEuler cat > /etc/yum.repos.d/openEuler.repo <<EOF2
[copy] name=copy #baseurl=https://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3/everything/aarch64/
# backend_002 #baseurl=http://120.46.140.206:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS:/Next/standard_aarch64/
# other #baseurl=http://124.70.71.209:82/openEuler-Mainline-copy:/Bak/standard_aarch64/
# backend_004 baseurl=http://124.70.10.167:82/openEuler:/20.03:/LTS/standard_aarch64/
enabled=1 gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=https://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3/OS/aarch64/RPM-GPG-KEY-openEuler EOF2
cat /etc/yum.repos.d/openEuler.repo
yum install git -y EOF
